SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus

Class DatacenterBrokerEX

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.DatacenterBroker
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.plus.DatacenterBrokerEX
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MonitoringBorkerEX
public class DatacenterBrokerEX extends DatacenterBroker
An extension to the default broker, which allows (i) VM destruction; (ii) definition of events prior to simulation start, which are fired later on; (iii) predefined "life length" of the broker; (iv) billing.
Author:
nikolay.grozev

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected static class 
    DatacenterBrokerEX.PresetEvent
    CloudSim does not execute events that are fired before the simulation has started.

  • Constructor Details

    • DatacenterBrokerEX

      public DatacenterBrokerEX(String name, double lifeLength) throws Exception
      Constr.
      Parameters:
      name - - the name of the broker.
      lifeLength - - for how long we need to keep this broker alive. If -1, then the broker is kept alive/running untill all cloudlets complete.
      Throws:
      Exception - - from the superclass.

    • processOtherEvent

      protected void processOtherEvent(SimEvent ev)
      Description copied from class: DatacenterBroker
      Process non-default received events that aren't processed by the DatacenterBroker.processEvent(org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEvent) method. This method should be overridden by subclasses in other to process new defined events.
      Overrides:
      processOtherEvent in class DatacenterBroker
      Parameters:
      ev - a SimEvent object

    • getLifeLength

    • bill

      public BigDecimal bill(Integer... datacenterIds)
      Bills the specified data centres with the specified policy. If no data centres are specified - then all data centres billed. NOTE: Before calling this method, you should set the billing policy.
      Parameters:
      datacenterIds - - the ids of the data centres.
      Returns:
      the incurred debt.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - - if the billing policy has not been set.
